forecast.name: Friday
forecast.snowAmount: New snow accumulation of 1 to 3 inches possible
forecast.detailedForecast: Snow showers before 9am, then snow showers and a slight chance of sleet between 9am and 1pm, then a chance of snow showers and a chance of freezing rain and a slight chance of sleet. Cloudy, with a high near 28. Southeast wind 5 to 15 mph, with gusts as high as 30 mph. Chance of precipitation is 90%. New snow accumulation of 1 to 3 inches possible. Little or no ice accumulation expected.

Huron Meadows Metropark (Brighton).conditions: Buck's Run still has complete coverage! But you'll have to walk a bit to get to it: the clubhouse is closed as is the clubhouse parking lot. Classic tracks are very hard pack or ice but still deep enough to stay on the track. The skating lane is hard pack but several people were skating without any trouble. Me? Klister. But my Rex "Oi" just wasn't working very well, probably because of the rushed job of waxing. Great day to doublepole!

nubsNob.liftsOpen: At least 5 chairlifts, Rope Tow and Conveyor.
nubsNob.xcTrails: Trails are fully open and in good condition with a classic track. Trails were packed on Tuesday.
nubsNob.comments: Merry Christmas Eve from all of us at Nub's Nob. The Grooming Crew came in late last night to create the best conditions possible from a thaw into freeze. Coverage on the slopes continues to be excellent and all of our snowmaking runs are open. The Pintail Lodge is open with food and an espresso bar. The soup of the day is cream of mushroom. The lifts will spin from 9:00 a.m. to 4:30 p.m. On Christmas Day we will be open from 11:00 a.m. to 4:30 p.m. Make it a great day at Nub's Nob.
